# Draft:Witch Queen Bee

WITCH QUEEN BEE
Author Chris Perry
“It’s only a bee!”   A small girl steps in to rescue a bee from the school bully.
Conservation is the theme throughout the book. When school bullies are faced how can this evolve into a situation where hedgehogs are hand reared, broken wings are repaired. Witchcraft is suspected. Sociology by way of old maps reveals unknown family history. Unexpected love stories, tales and legends that span multi generations. A nasty sister and local Chief Inspector cast worry over the family as they try to keep an old secret concealed. Conservation of bees runs alongside their primary school’s aim to have its own apiary. An auntie who heals animals has the ability to fly. She is their safeguard in her guise as a fox. All this in the humour of family dynamics. As four children discover witchcraft and friendship to become a vital part of a unique family
